document_data.name: Goldenleaf Stables
document_data.mainbody: '''Goldenleaf Stables''' was a horse breeding stable in [[New Velar|Harrowdale]] and considered by many to be the best throughout the [[Dalelands]], particularly for riding mounts and ladies' palfreys.
document_data.Locations: Goldenleaf Stables was located on the northwestern edge of town on both sides of [[Lancegallop Lane]].
document_data.Atmosphere: The stables were large and well-kept.
document_data.Services: A typical mount purchased at Goldenleaf Stables cost 125 [[gp]], but the proprietor preferred matching customers with mounts over long periods of training for an extra 50 gp.
document_data.Inhabitants: The stables were owned by [[Sheera Goldenleaf]]. The stables' reputation of excellent training and fine breeding brought wealthy customers from both [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]]. The success of the stables allowed Sheera to sponsor various needy [[Harran]] organizations.
document_data.Defenses: Sheera's staff included seven [[elven]] horsefolk, all of whom were skilled archers who defended the stables with "[[elfshot]]" shafts.
